mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT( region2.Prv, " ", region3.Cty, " ", region1.Twn ) FROM region AS region1, region AS region2, region AS region3 WHERE region1.RegionCode = #{regionCode} AND concat( LEFT ( region1.RegionCode, 2 ), '0000' ) = region2.RegionCode AND concat( LEFT ( region1.RegionCode, 4 ), '00' ) = region3.RegionCode

select region1.RegionCode, region2.Prv, region3.Cty, region1.Twn, region1.Stage from region as region1, region as region2, region as region3 where region1.RegionCode=#{id} and concat(left(region1.RegionCode,2), '0000') = region2.RegionCode and concat(left(region1.RegionCode,4), '00') = region3.RegionCode
